attributes.action: Expedition of court hearing whereby children are removed from one parent.
attributes.additional_details:
Currently 6 week wait for family court hearings for child arrangement orders, when allegations only.
This constitutes emotional abuse for children and needs to be a maximum of 2 weeks.
attributes.background: Introduce 14 day deadline for cases where one parent is intent on destroying the other while NOT focusing on the best interests of the children.

rejection.details: The scheduling of court dates is a matter for the UK Courts which are independent of the UK Government and Parliament.
